Name: 青翠之森的遗梦
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements} and {1} stack of {buff_evergreen}.

Name: 生机
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements} and {1} stack of {buff_vitality}.

Name: 聚雷
Description: 获得{0}层元素和{1}层超凡,造成{2}点伤害。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements} and {1} stack of {buff_extraordinary}, deal {2} damage.

Name: 风暴
Description: 获得{0}层元素和{1}层超凡,造成{2}点伤害,给予选择目标{3}层易伤。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements} and {1} stacks of {buff_extraordinary}, deal {2} damage, and apply {3} stacks of {buff_vulnerability} to the target.

Name: 雷绝
Description: 获得{0}层元素和{1}层超凡,造成{2}点伤害。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements} and {1} stacks of {buff_extraordinary}, deal {2} damage.

Name: 火起
Description: 获得{0}层元素,给予敌人{1}层灼烧。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements} and apply {1} stack of {buff_burn} to enemies.

Name: 火中兽
Description: 获得{0}层元素,给予敌人等量灼烧,并触发敌人的所有灼烧。抽取{1}张牌。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements} and give enemies the same amount of {buff_burn}, triggering all of their {buff_burn} effects. Draw {1} card.

Name: 掌心炎
Description: 获得{0}层元素,给予敌人{1}层灼烧,造成{2}点伤害。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements}, give enemies {1} stack of {buff_burn}, and deal {2} damage.

Name: 元素护盾
Description: 获得{0}层元素,获得元素层数+5点护盾。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements} and gain a shield equal to the number of stacks of {buff_elements} you have.

Name: 元素升华
Description: 获得{0}层元素,抽取元素层数1/4张卡牌。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements}, draw 1/4 of the number of stacks of {buff_elements} cards.

Name: 元素循环
Description: 获得{0}层元素,获得元素层数1/4点行动点。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements}, gain 1/4 of the number of stacks of {buff_elements} power.

Name: 元素爆发
Description: 获得{0}层元素,对所有敌人造成等同于元素层数点伤害。
Description_en: Gain {0} stacks of {buff_elements}, deal damage equal to the number of stacks of {buff_elements} to all enemies.
